Description.Text:
Property Location
You'll be centrally located in Augsburg with a stay at Holiday Inn Express Augsburg, minutes from Marionette Theater and St. Ulrich's Church. This hotel is within close proximity of Roman Museum and Fugger Museum and Fuggerei.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 136 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and separate sitting areas.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of Holiday Inn Express Augsburg. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in Augsburg? This hotel has facilities measuring 1625 square feet (151 square meters), including meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of Holiday Inn Express Augsburg. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

You'll be centrally located in Augsburg with a stay at Holiday Inn Express Augsburg, minutes from Marionette Theater and St. Ulrich's Church. This hotel is within close proximity of Roman Museum and Fugger Museum and Fuggerei.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Marionette Theater - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
St. Ulrich's Church - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Roman Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Fugger Museum and Fuggerei - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Augsburg Town Hall - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Town Hall Square - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Augsburg Cathedral - 1.6 km / 1 mi
City Theater - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Mozarthaus Augsburg - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Rosenaustadion - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Augsburg Trade Fair - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Golf Augsburg - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Konigstherme - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi
Blockhausturm - 38 km / 23.6 mi
Museum of Local History - 42.1 km / 26.2 mi

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Express Augsburg is Munich (MUC-Franz Josef Strauss Intl.) - 64.9 km / 40.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
